description.p: This SDK extension allows you to build and run .NET Core apps.

release.description:
Included runtimes .NET Runtime 6.0.0 ASP.NET Core Runtime 6.0.0 .NET Desktop Runtime 6.0.0
Language support C# 10.0 F# 6.0 Visual Basic 16.9

Full version 6.0.100-rc.1.21458.32
Included runtimes .NET Runtime 6.0.0-rc.1.21451.13 ASP.NET Core Runtime 6.0.0-rc.1.21452.15 .NET Desktop Runtime 6.0.0-rc.1.21451.3
Language support C# 10.0 F# 5.0 Visual Basic 16.9
